languages.text: "Не переживай. Я проходил через худшее... Сравнивать сложно, учитывая, что я никогда не попадал в лапы друкари... но я выживу".

traits.locale_text: "Не переживай. Я проходил через худшее... наверняка. Сравнивать сложно, учитывая, что я никогда не попадал в лапы друкари... но я выживу".

languages.text: "Don't worry. I've been through worse... It's hard to draw a comparison though, since I've never fallen into the clutches of the Drukhari before... but I'll survive."
languages.original_text: "Не переживай. Я проходил через худшее... Сравнивать сложно, учитывая, что я никогда не попадал в лапы друкари... но я выживу".

traits.locale_text: "Don't worry. I've been through worse... It's hard to draw a comparison though, since I've never fallen into the clutches of the Drukhari before... but I'll survive."
"Don't worry. I've been through worse... It's hard to draw a comparison though, since I've never fallen into the clutches of the Drukhari before... but I'll survive."
"Don't worry. I've been through worse... It's hard to draw a comparison though, since I've never fallen into the clutches of the Drukhari before... but I'll survive."
"Don't worry. I've been through worse... It's hard to draw a comparison though, since I've never fallen into the clutches of the Drukhari before... but I'll survive."

languages.text: “别担心，比这更糟糕的事情我都经历过……这确实很难比较，因为我之前从来没落到过黑暗灵族手里……不过，我不会有生命危险。”
languages.original_text: "Don't worry. I've been through worse... It's hard to draw a comparison though, since I've never fallen into the clutches of the Drukhari before... but I'll survive."

traits.locale_text: “别担心，比这更糟糕的事情我都经历过……这确实很难比较，因为我之前从来没落到过黑暗灵族手里……不过，我不会有生命危险。”

languages.text: «No se preocupe, he estado en peores... Es difícil comparar, porque nunca había caído en garras de los Drukhari... pero sobreviviré».
languages.original_text: "Don't worry. I've been through worse... It's hard to draw a comparison though, since I've never fallen into the clutches of the Drukhari before... but I'll survive."

traits.locale_text: «No se preocupe, he estado en peores... Es difícil comparar, porque nunca había caído en garras de los Drukhari... pero sobreviviré».

languages.text: 「心配するな、私はもっとひどい目に遭ってきた…デュカーリの魔の手に落ちたことはないから、比較するのは難しいが…私は生き延びる」
languages.original_text: "Don't worry. I've been through worse... It's hard to draw a comparison though, since I've never fallen into the clutches of the Drukhari before... but I'll survive."

traits.locale_text: 「心配するな、私はもっとひどい目に遭ってきた…デュカーリの魔の手に落ちたことはないから、比較するのは難しいが…私は生き延びる」

languages.text: « Ne vous inquiétez pas, j'ai connu pire... Comme c'est la première fois que je finis entre les griffes des Drukharis, je n'ai aucune expérience similaire avec laquelle comparer ça, mais... je m'en remettrai. »
languages.original_text: "Don't worry. I've been through worse... It's hard to draw a comparison though, since I've never fallen into the clutches of the Drukhari before... but I'll survive."

traits.locale_text: « Ne vous inquiétez pas, j'ai connu pire... Comme c'est la première fois que je finis entre les griffes des Drukharis, je n'ai aucune expérience similaire avec laquelle comparer ça, mais... je m'en remettrai. »

languages.text: "Keine Sorge. Ich habe schon Schlimmeres durchgemacht ... Ein Vergleich fällt mir allerdings schwer, da ich zuvor noch nie in die Fänge der Drukhari geraten bin ... aber ich werde es überleben."
languages.original_text: "Don't worry. I've been through worse... It's hard to draw a comparison though, since I've never fallen into the clutches of the Drukhari before... but I'll survive."

traits.locale_text: "Keine Sorge. Ich habe schon Schlimmeres durchgemacht ... Ein Vergleich fällt mir allerdings schwer, da ich zuvor noch nie in die Fänge der Drukhari geraten bin ... aber ich werde es überleben."

languages.text: "Endişelenme. Daha kötülerini de atlattım... Gerçi kıyaslamak biraz zor çünkü daha önce Drukharilerin pençesine hiç düşmemiştim ama... Yaşayacağım."
languages.original_text: "Don't worry. I've been through worse... It's hard to draw a comparison though, since I've never fallen into the clutches of the Drukhari before... but I'll survive."
